pages.text: This tab allows you to specify the order to display the artifacts. There is a number for each filter category and each entry in all categories.$(br2)Artifacts that meet requirements with smaller sort index in category with smallest sort index will be displayed first. If 2 artifacts tie in one category, the next category will be used to determine the order.

Click on a category sort number button to set it to the first priority, and all other categories will be shifted behind.$(br2)Click on a filter requirement to set it to the first priority within the category. Then all other requirements will be shifted behind. Unselected requirements in filter tab won't have a sort index.
